name: Quick & Easy Vegan Banana Muffins
description: The BEST Vegan Banana Muffins ever! They are so quick & easy to whip up using just 1 bowl, and are perfect for a weekend breakfast. Add chopped walnuts or chocolate chips.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/4 cups mashed banana  (| 2 large or 3 small bananas)
3/4 cup chopped walnuts or chocolate chips (plus more for sprinkling on top)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Line a standard muffin pan with liners and spray them lightly with oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Line a standard muffin pan with liners and spray them lightly with oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the bananas in a large mixing bowl. Measure to make sure you have about 1 1/4 cups mashed banana.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the bananas in a large mixing bowl. Measure to make sure you have about 1 1/4 cups mashed banana.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the non-dairy milk, oil, sugar, vinegar and vanilla to the bowl and whisk with the bananas until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the non-dairy milk, oil, sugar, vinegar and vanilla to the bowl and whisk with the bananas until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: To the wet mixture, add the flour, then sprinkle the baking powder and salt on top of the flour. Stir to mix with a large spoon until just combined; be careful not to over mix. Some small lumps are fine.
recipeInstructions.name: To the wet mixture, add the flour, then sprinkle the baking powder and salt on top of the flour. Stir to mix with a large spoon until just combined; be careful not to over mix. Some small lumps are fine.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in chopped walnuts or chocolate chips, if using. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, add batter to the liners in the pan almost all the way full. Sprinkle more walnuts/chocolate chips on top if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in chopped walnuts or chocolate chips, if using. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, add batter to the liners in the pan almost all the way full. Sprinkle more walnuts/chocolate chips on top if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 20-24 minutes, until golden on top and a toothpick comes out clean. Let cool for 5 minutes in the pan, then transfer to a cooling rack. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 20-24 minutes, until golden on top and a toothpick comes out clean. Let cool for 5 minutes in the pan, then transfer to a cooling rack. Enjoy!

keywords: easy vegan breakfast, vegan banana muffins
